comments.body:
This is `win and py27` not `win or py27`, which means other combinations of `win`+`pyXX` should work.
So this recipes is missing a build dependency on Python, to activate the `vc`, and the proper `vc`s features.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win and py27]

requirements:
